title: problem title
language_supported: among c, cpp, py, java only
description: description for the problem in markdown language
input_format: description for the problem's input in markdown language
output_format: description for the problem's output markdown language
time_limit: time limit for the problem in seconds. Ex: 1s, 2s, 10s
space_limit: memory limit for the problem. Ex: 1MB, 2048MB, 1024MB

constraints.constraint on the first input: constraint in the mark down language
constraints.constraint on the second input: constraint in the mark down language
constraints.constraint on the third input: constraint in the mark down language
constraint in the mark down language

sample_testcases.explanation: explanation for the testcase1 in mark down language
explanation for the testcase2 in mark down language

tags: tags related to the problem in the array of strings.
